metadata.name: Potential DCOM InternetExplorer.Application DLL Hijack
metadata.comment: Detects potential DLL hijack of "iertutil.dll" found in the DCOM InternetExplorer.Application Class over the network

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND lower(actor.process.name) = lower('system') AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\internet explorer\\\\iertutil.dll')))

output.summary: Detects potential DLL hijack of "iertutil.dll" found in the DCOM InternetExplorer.Application Class over the network
